user_question: What are the basic rules of rugby and generate an image of a rugby match?
final_answer: Basic rules of rugby: 15 players per team, the game lasts 80 minutes, points are scored by tries, conversions, penalty kicks, and drop goals. Image of a rugby match generated. Rugby positions include forwards (props, hooker, locks, flankers, number 8) and backs (scrum-half, fly-half, centers, wings, fullback).
